name: Modnar Dungeon
description:
Modnar Dungeon

Once upon a time, a group of adventurers entered an ancient dungeon. All of them but one perished. The only survivor was badly wounded but he brought back unimaginable wealth and became one of the richest men ever known. Since that day hundreds of warriors took their chance in the Modnar Dungeon. However most of them were never seen again.

As soon as the hero enters the dungeon, the entrance collapses and the only way is to move forward.

Controls :

  • Left click to move
  • Drag and drop items in your inventory
  • Right click to use items
